diff_act: 1.send a signal to the corresponding unit

regen.absent_element: designation of ON or OFF status in the request
regen.new_specification: The system shall include the designation of ON or OFF status in the heating or cooling request to ensure proper control of the units.

regen.absent_element: the signal of turning on or off the unit should be designated
regen.new_specification: The system shall generate the signal of turning on or off the unit

regen.absent_element: the specific condition or trigger for generating the heating or cooling request
regen.new_specification: The system shall generate a heating or cooling request when the temperature exceeds a predefined threshold or upon receipt of a manual override command.

label: This request shall indicate whether that unit is to be turned on or off
absence: indication of on/off status in the request
